DOC.brief_title: Rifampin Drug-Drug Interaction Study With Lurasidone HCl
DOC.detailed_description: perform open-label , 2-period , sequential study healthy subject . All subject ( N=20 ) assign treatment sequence , 40 mg po dosing .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Use inhibitor inducer CYP3A4 take within 30 day prior study Day 2 4 . Use ( ) investigational drug ( ) within 30 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior Screening . 5 .
